LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromSlag.label: smelt metal from slag
LanguageData.ExtractMetalFromSlag.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from slag chunks.
LanguageData.SmeltWeapon.label: smelt metal from weapon
LanguageData.SmeltWeapon.description: Use heat and strong electromagnets to separate useful metal from weapons.
LanguageData.DestroyWeapon.label: destroy weapon
LanguageData.DestroyWeapon.description: Use heat to destroy unwanted weapons. Faster than smelting, and works on non-smeltable items, but yields no resources.
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.label: butcher corpse
LanguageData.ButcherCorpseFlesh.description: Butchers a corpse to obtain its meat in usable form.
LanguageData.MakeStoneBlocksAny.label: cut stone blocks
LanguageData.MakeStoneBlocksAny.description: Cuts a stone chunk into usable stone blocks. \n\n产出：20 sand and 5 rubble as a by-product.
LanguageData.MakeStoneBlocks_Electric.label: cut stone blocks
LanguageData.MakeStoneBlocks_Electric.description: Cuts a stone chunk into usable stone blocks. \n\n产出：20 sand and 5 rubble as a by-product.
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterCorpse.label: extract biomatter from corpse
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterCorpse.description: Extracts BioMatter from a corpse. \n\n产出：35.
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterAnimal.label: extract biomatter from animal corpse
LanguageData.ExtractBiomatterAnimal.description: Extracts BioMatter from an animal corpse. \n\n产出：10.
LanguageData.makesoylentgreen.label: obtain soylent green
LanguageData.makesoylentgreen.description: Obtain Soylent Green from a humanlike corpse. \n\n产出：45.
